subject: CNN Alerts: bush, etc.
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
U.S., Iran to hold first formal talks in 27 years

05/27/07 05:42 PM, EDT
U.S. diplomats said Monday's scheduled talks with Iran will be limited to discussions about Iraq's security, and not about the unresolved issues of detained Americans in Iran or the country's nuclear program.
FULL STORY



Alert Name: bush
Bush, bikers mark Memorial Day weekend

05/27/07 05:40 PM, EDT
President Bush likes a serene White House most Sundays. Every now and then, though, he is ready for rumble.
FULL STORY
